column2:
ggplot(dff_q %>%
         gather(BIG5_name, 
                BIG5_res,
                dff_q %>% colnames() %>% str_detect("^AMBI_BIG5_") %>% which()) %>%
         mutate(BIG5_res_ = BIG5_res %>% cut(c(-4,-1,1,4))), 
       aes(x=CatchCovid, y=MorallyWrong, color=BIG5_res_)) +
  facet_wrap(~BIG5_name, ncol = 2) +
  geom_point(size=0.1) +
  geom_smooth(method='lm')
